# 1 The primary objective 

To estimate the variability among professionals regarding the control of the HbA1c, adjusting for the characteristics at the patient level.

# 2 Methods

NCLUSION: diabetic patients type 2 between 30 and 90 years old with a record in the electronic history of diabetes: ICD-10: Code E11 and E14.
EXCLUSION: patients classified as dead or transferred; patients with recent diagnosis.

# 3 Statistical Analysis
The demographic and clinical profile of the included patients is described using the most appropriate statistics in each case, depending on the type of variable. The demographic and clinical profile of the professionals included are described, using the most appropriate statistics in each case, depending on the type of variable.
